title: Are the risks involved in sea and space tourism too high?
description: Companies offering dangerous adventures to the ends of the Earth are attracting billions of dollars every year.

title: Missing Titanic sub likely imploded in ‘catastrophic loss’
description: Debris of missing submersible was found near the bow of the Titanic on sea floor with all on board lost, official says.

description: Activists accuse ex-President Gotabaya Rajapaksa of tampering with police records to hamper inquiry into mass killings.

description: The al-Jouri matriarch says demolition of their home of 16 years is an attempt to 'destroy' their memories.

title: Bank of England hikes borrowing rates more than expected

title: Bolsonaro faces uncertain political future as Brazil trial starts
description: The former right-wing president is accused of spreading false claims about Brazil's election system.

title: EU holds talks with Kosovo, Serbia leaders amid tension

description: At least six people are injured in attack on village of Kafr Nouran, according to the Syrian Civil Defence volunteers.

title: Vatican pursues new leads in Emanuela Orlandi cold case

description: A hurricane watch was issued as Tropical Storm Bret threatens to rip through Caribbean islands.

title: Israeli settlers set up new illegal outpost on Palestinian land
